In England, in the seven days to 19 June, there were 57,113 new confirmed cases (101.5 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 12 June, there were 42,386 new cases and so the new cases have risen by 35% (14,727 extra cases). The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in England so far as at 24 June is 4,079,362 (7,247.4 cases per 100,000 population).
